text: Shadow () is a 1971 Soviet comedy movie directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova.От сказок до трагедий. Пять ярких кинообразов Олега ДаляТЕНЬ (1971) It stars Oleg Dal, Konstantin Adashevsky, and Vladimir Etush. == Actors == * Oleg Dal as Scientist / His Shadow * Konstantin Adashevsky as Butler * Vladimir Etush as Piestro, Annuanciata's father, hotel keeper, man eater * Sergey Filippov as Prime minister * Zinoviy Gerdt as Finance minister * Lyudmila Gurchenko as Yulia Juli == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Nadezhda Kosheverova
title: Shadow (1971 movie)
